DOC.brief_summary: To understand the urine analysis of athletes
DOC.brief_title: Study of Prevalence of Proteinuria, Urinary Tract Infection or Hematuria in Athletes
DOC.detailed_description: there maybe some genitourinary problem related to athletes, such as proteinuria, hematuria, scrotal pain, STD, etc. To explore these problems and give adequate management for them not only improved athletes' health, but also it can do their best in their exercise performance.
